hero.title: Start your fitness journey to a better self with online collaboration with me
hero.subtitle: Whether you're a beginner, have been working out for a long time, or just lost motivation for training. Get in touch and together we'll work on achieving your fitness goals!
hero.description: We start by asking you a few questions about your current habits and goals. Based on that information, I'll customize a training and nutrition program just for you!

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.lead: I am Ivana Nikić, master professor of sports and physical education, as well as a personal trainer and functional fitness trainer for women in groups.
about.passion: My passion for fitness and healthy lifestyle developed during my student days, when I intensively studied the body, health, nutrition and various sports disciplines.
about.journey: I decided to direct my knowledge and energy towards the coaching profession and the gym, so since 2019 I have been dedicated to helping others achieve their fitness goals and improve their health.
about.philosophy: Coaching is demanding and challenging, because every body has its own specifics and needs. However, with my experience, dedication and continuous improvement, I'm here to help you achieve the desired results.
about.approach: Whether you want to build muscle, lose excess weight, improve fitness or simply want to feel better in your body, I will adapt training and nutrition to your individual needs and goals.
about.goals: Do you want weight loss, muscle mass gain, working on yourself or strength training?
about.commitment: Your task will be to surrender to the process and always say how much the plan was followed, whether completely or there were deviations.

credentials.cert1: Master Professor of Sports and Physical Education

training.title: Training Plan
training.description: Personalized training program created specifically for you and your goals.

nutrition.title: Nutrition Plan
nutrition.description: Based on what you like to eat and which foods agree with you

videos.title: Exercise Video Instructions
videos.description: So you'll know exactly how to perform each technique

communication.title: Viber Communication with Me
communication.description: To track your progress, weekly reports are mandatory. This way we'll see together how your body responds to training and nutrition, and adjust the plan as needed. If any questions or doubts arise, I'll be available on Viber!

pricing.title: CHOOSE YOUR PLAN
pricing.lead: Are you interested in starting the journey to your fitness goals with me? Apply for online collaboration through my Instagram account or email:

features.note: Gym fee not included in service price

pricing.afterPayment: After registration and payment, you get a personalized program created just for you, so we can start working on achieving your goals right away!

contact.lead: Are you interested in starting the journey to your fitness goals with me?
